data.title: Madworld Haunted Attraction, Best Haunted House in South Carolina
data.meta_description: Madworld, near Greenville SC, has been awarded "Best Haunted House in South Carolina", and is a "Scariest Haunted House in America" finalist.
data.text:
$50

General Admission

"Scaredy Cat"

General Admission to MADWORLD'S NEW 2024 Haunted House/Trail with "No-Scare Medallion". This is a self-guided tour. *The "No-Scare Medallion" allows those scaredy adults or teenagers to finally be able to brave Madworld with their friends. The medallion signals to the monsters that you personally do not want to be targeted or scared. The others in your group are fair game! The Medallion can be picked up at the ticket booth, customer service booth or Gift Shop.

$100

Scream All Night Pass

Unlimited FRONT OF LINE ACCESS (No Waiting) ALL NIGHT LONG to MADWORLD'S NEW 2024 Haunted House/Trail. This is a self-guided tour. (Still enjoy everything Madworld has to offer without having to wait in any lines! Go through Madworld with Fastpass access as many times as you want for the entire evening. Includes Admission). *Valid for one night only. Not Shareable. *Valid for one night only. Not Shareable.

$45

Child Superhero

Children 10 and under only Admission to MADWORLD'S NEW 2024 Haunted House/Trail with "No-Scare Medallion". This is a self-guided tour. *(The No-Scare Medallion allows your children to take back control of the night by not only signaling to the monsters to stay away from him/her, but also gives the child special powers to control the monster!) *Must be accompanied by an adult.

$25

Early Access Pass Add-On

The Early Access Pass allows you early entrance into the park 10 minutes before gates open to skip the line outside the gate, interact with the roaming monsters first-hand without large crowds around, and get first access to food, gift shop, and be the first to get in line to the attraction! This can be added to any ticket type you have purchased. (One per each guest).

$10

No-Scare Medallion

Add on a No-Scare Medallion to any order! Grab as many as you may need for other guests coming with you. *The "No-Scare Medallion" allows you to finally be able to brave Madworld with your friends. The medallion signals to the monsters that you personally do not want to be targeted or scared. The others in your group are fair game! The Medallion can be picked up at the ticket booth, customer service booth or Gift Shop upon your arrival. (Price is per person. Does not include admission to any part of the attractions).

$25

25 Tickets (Carnival Games, Axe Throwing & Mini Golf)

An interactive area part of Madworld's scary Fall entertainment! Whether you are a kid, teenager, or big kid at heart - you will have a BLAST at these scary interactive carnival games, Axe Throwing, & our 18-hole Ghost Town Mini Golf! (15 tickets for mini golf, 5 tickets per carnival game, and 10 tickets for 10 minutes of unlimited axe throwing). Tickets are per person.

$50

50 Tickets (Carnival Games, Axe Throwing & Mini Golf)

An interactive area part of Madworld's scary Fall entertainment! Whether you are a kid, teenager, or big kid at heart - you will have a BLAST at these scary interactive carnival games, Axe Throwing, & our 18-hole Ghost Town Mini Golf! (15 tickets for mini golf, 5 tickets per carnival game, and 10 tickets for 10 minutes of unlimited axe throwing). Tickets are per person.

$75

75 Tickets (Carnival Games, Axe Throwing & Mini Golf)

An interactive area part of Madworld's scary Fall entertainment! Whether you are a kid, teenager, or big kid at heart - you will have a BLAST at these scary interactive carnival games, Axe Throwing, & our 18-hole Ghost Town Mini Golf! (15 tickets for mini golf, 5 tickets per carnival game, and 10 tickets for 10 minutes of unlimited axe throwing). Tickets are per person.

Afraid Of The Dark?

Purchase a medallion at the ticket booth and you’ll be given "superhero" powers for every step you take at the best haunted house in Greenville SC. In fact, Madworld’s monsters will be so afraid of your new mojo, they’ll literally run AWAY from you.

Control your fate. Talk to the ticket booth about our medallions and learn how you can take back the night!

Learn More!
